content: फ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Obvious, evident. --फः {@--1@} A high wind, stormy gale. {@--2@} Yawning with the mouth wide open. {@--3@} Fruitfulness. {@--4@} An increaser. {@--5@} The performance of a mystical rite (to propitiate Kubera's attendants). {@--6@} Increasing, expanding. --फा {@--1@} Useless or idle speech ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also). {@--2@} Heat. {@--3@} Increase. {@--4@} An increaser. --फं {@--1@} An angry speech. {@--2@} Blowing into, puffing up.
